Articles.Content: I'm looking for an SSTO that can attach to my interplanetary ring I made and of course since I suck at spacecraft(more of a plane guy) I am asking for some help, Here is the ring that I made so you can get an idea of the size http://imgur.com/a/fIiaC#0 . If any one can help it would be greatly appreciated:D. Also feel free to use this to show off your other SSTO's to people

I'm looking for an SSTO that can attach to my interplanetary ring I made and of course since I suck at spacecraft(more of a plane guy) I am asking for some help, Here is the ring that I made so you can get an idea of the size http://imgur.com/a/fIiaC#0 . If any one can help it would be greatly appreciated:D. Also feel free to use this to show off your other SSTO's to people

What will it be used for, just crew transfer, fuel?
You could try a ring that attached to the top of a space plane which makes things easier. This was mine in 0.9. The idea should still work, minus the VTOL capabilities.

What will it be used for, just crew transfer, fuel?

It will be used for crew transfer up to the ring

- - - Updated - - -

You could try a ring that attached to the top of a space plane which makes things easier. This was mine in 0.9. The idea should still work, minus the VTOL capabilities.

ok ill use that idea for my next one that im making, it will be a mining transport and i will be able to launch the parts normally so no need for an ssto though. But thanks ill try that. And nice video:)

Edited July 15, 2015 by Mr.Mania
